Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

getPrice(address).custom:error: TokenNotConfigured is thrown when asset has no oracle configured

returns.price: Price in (36 - asset decimals) format, same as ResilientOracle

params.accessControlManager_: Address of the access control manager

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAccessControlManager(address).details: Admin function to set address of AccessControlManager

params.accessControlManager_: The new address of the AccessControlManager

setTokenOracleConfig(address,address).custom:error: ZeroAddress is thrown when token or oracle address is zero

params.oracle: Address of the DEX oracle to use

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

TokenNotConfigured().notice: Thrown when token is not configured

Unauthorized(address,address,string).notice: Thrown when the action is prohibited by AccessControlManager

ZeroAddress().notice: Thrown when a zero address is provided

NewAccessControlManager(address,address).notice: Emitted when access control manager contract address is changed

TokenOracleConfigUpdated(address,address.notice: Emitted when a token's oracle configuration is updated

accessControlManager().notice: Returns the address of the access control manager contract

getPrice(address).notice: Get the price of an asset from the configured DEX oracle

setTokenOracleConfig(address,address).notice: Set oracle configuration for a token

tokenConfigs(address).notice: Mapping of token addresses to their oracle configuration

userdoc.notice: Aggregator oracle that routes price requests to appropriate DEX oracles
